title: U-NEXT MUSIC FES - Love Live! Series EXPO 2025 STAGE ~Right now!~
description: U-NEXT MUSIC FES - Love Live! Series EXPO 2025 STAGE ~Right now!~ is a live concert to be held by [https://video.unext.jp/ U-NEXT] as part of the  which features the Love Live! franchise on its third day. The concert took place at EXPO Arena "Matsuri", Osaka on August 14, 2025.
